course_description: Methods of collection, classification, analysis, and interpretation of economic data; measures of central tendency and dispersion; probability; estimation; hypothesis testing; regression analysis.
prerequisites: (ECON 101 or BUS 201) and (MATH 111 or MATH_OX 111 or MATH_OX 119 or MATH 116 or MATH_OX 180 or MATH_OX 110B or MATH 112 or MATH 112Z or MATH_OX 112 or MATH_OX 112Z) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
